Author: JohnParker14159
Text: You can do this. Even if the feelings of longing for control and temptation to return become overwhelming, losing a battle does not mean defeat. A recovery journey can be filled with struggles and still end in long-term success. One reason to never come back is that there are people in your life who want to see you grow in health and strength. Even if the struggle against temptation and deceptive beliefs about coming back are a day-by-day or hour-by-hour struggle, your perseverance is a gift to yourself and the people in your life.

Author: Ieyeku
Text: The lack of nutrition from restriction will cause your body to weaken and quite literally crumble. You won't be happy and definitely wont be able to afford it because of all the medical Bills from prescriptions and your weak dying heart. If you have a pet they will become depressed and seeing you so sick would make make Mr. Rodgers cry.
